message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game.
You were too generous, I'm not going to let it go that easily!
Meet me in the middle. It's time to make a deal.
You're getting desperate, I'm going to take advantage of that!
I'll meet you halfway, but this is my final offer.
I'm not falling for your 'final' offer. I'll take a bigger share this time!
It's time to split it down the middle. Let's call it a draw.
